lead_paragraph: Preparations continued for the Golden Spike track and field meeting in Ostrava, Czech Republic, and the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial golf tournament began in Fort Worth.
snippet: Preparations continued for the Golden Spike track and field meeting in Ostrava, Czech Republic, and the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial golf tournament began in Fort Worth.
